ai.summary: A gentle 5.8 km loop in the UK featuring the Moorish Tower as a focal point. Suitable for beginners and families, with easy terrain and pleasant views.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained paths with some gravel sections and gentle slopes. Expect even surfaces suitable for casual walking.
ai.safety_notes: Carry water and wear sturdy footwear. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven ground near the tower, and check weather conditions before starting. Let someone know your planned route and carry a charged phone.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal for this route; it is walkable year-round with appropriate clothing.

seo.title: Moorish Tower Walk — Easy 5.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a gentle 5.8 km hike to the Moorish Tower in the UK. Easy terrain, family-friendly, with safety tips and practical gear recommendations.
